titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Ancamine 2422 Curing Agent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
12/4/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Anacamine 2422 Curing Agent.
